Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Padiaset son of Nakhtbast with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the incised seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of incised Hieroglyphs, there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
